spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but window placement is incorrect; the 3D model adds windows to the left living room wall not present in the plan. Door orientation for the main entrance is vague.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and adjacent correctly. However, wall thickness is inconsistent, and the transition between the living area and utility appears structurally distorted.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture scale is largely accurate, but the orientation of the dining table and the arrangement of the living room seating has been slightly altered compared to the 2D layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good isometric perspective and clean lighting. The text rendering on the floors is a significant visual artifact.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated windows on the left exterior wall of the living/dining area.
Proportion distortion in the balcony depth compared to the original 7'10'' x 3'5'' dimensions.
Rendering artifacts present as garbled, non-functional text labels on the floor surfaces.
Missing specific kitchen appliance details such as the stovetop burners shown in the 2D plan.
Orientation error regarding the main entrance door wing and swing path.
